title: Charlie Lee
body:
IP Objective: Charlie Lee
Minimum Fund Raising Target: 500 000
Maximum Fund Raising Target: 1 000 000
Stake Pool Start Date: 2021.12.01  18:00
Stake Pool End Time: 2021.12.05    19:00

Litecoin founder and former Coinbase Director of Engineering, Charlie Lee has close to a million followers on Twitter, making him one of the more popular thought leaders and crypto authorities. On his Twitter account, Lee shares the latest Litecoin and Litecoin Foundation news, as well as the latest articles related to crypto. He occasionally shares memes and comic strips that paint crypto news and issues in a more accessible and humorous way. 

One of the most reliable sources of information on crypto and how it works, Lee has recently joined BTCS Inc. as one of its Board of Directors.
author: 0x6c665834015f725Bd27FECDA2394806BE3b8D6d9
